      • _addHotKeys

        protected void _addHotKeys(diva.graph.JGraph jgraph)
        Add hot keys to the actions in the given JGraph. This method is overridden so that we can call it in addComposite().
        Overrides:
        _addHotKeys in class ActorEditorGraphController
        Parameters:
